channel.title: CVE Feed for zhuyi -- BuddyPress Members Only
channel.description: The latest CVEs for zhuyi -- BuddyPress Members Only

item.title: CVE-2024-0972|2024-07-17T14:18:55.574Z -- zhuyi -- buddypress%20members%20only
item.description: The BuddyPress Members Only plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 3.3.5 via the REST API. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to bypass the plugin's "All Other Sections On Your Site Will be Opened to Guest" feature (when unset) and view restricted page and post content.

item.title: CVE-2024-0972|2024-06-06T03:53:11.546Z -- zhuyi -- buddypress%20members%20only
item.description: The BuddyPress Members Only plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 3.3.5 via the REST API. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to bypass the plugin's "All Other Sections On Your Site Will be Opened to Guest" feature (when unset) and view restricted page and post content.
